messages.subject: Fw: NBTHK/AB Stolen Sword Alert
messages.msgSnippet: FYI Below... Jim ... From: Richard Mantegani To: Mantegani, Richard Sent: Thursday, January 06, 2005 11:27 AM Subject: NBTHK/AB Stolen Sword Alert Dear
messages.messageBody:
FYI Below...

Jim

----- Original Message -----
From: Richard Mantegani
To: Mantegani, Richard
Sent: Thursday, January 06, 2005 11:27 AM
Subject: NBTHK/AB Stolen Sword Alert


Dear NBTHK/AB membership,

The following information was just received.

Sincerely,

The officers and directors of the NBTHK/AB


Stolen Sword report

The following four swords were stolen from Richard Yamamoto. The swords were stolen in Bakersfield, CA on December 9th. If you have an information or have been offered these swords please contact him at RichyRch@...



1. Katana signed Bizen No Kuni Osafune Kiyomitsu. The blade was forged sometime in the OEI era (ca.1400 A.D.). The blade is of the length of 2 SHAKU 2 SUN



2. Katana signed Settsu Izumi No Kami Kunisada. The blade was forged sometime in the Genna era (ca. 1623 A.D.). The blade is of the length of 2 Shaku 5 Sun 6 Bu



3. Wakizashi signed Sendai Junkokushoku with hollyhock engraved. The blade was forged sometime in the Kanbun era (T.N., about 1700 A.D.). The blade is of the length of 1 Shaku 8 Sun



4. Wakizashi signed Echizen Yasutsugu with hollyhock engraved. The blade was forged sometime in the Kanbun era (ca. 1660 A.D.) The blade is of the length of 1 Shaku 8 Sun


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
